title: Segmentation fault (core dumped)
body_html:
When I training my model, after hundreds of batches, the segmentation fault always occurs.

  • PyTorch or Caffe2: Pytorch
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • PyTorch version: 0.4.0a0+57ee202
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
  • Python version: 3.6
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.1

Thread 1 "python" received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007fffe958f5ca in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.so.1
(gdb) where
#0 0x00007fffe958f5ca in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.so.1
#1 0x00007fffe94b5269 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.so.1
#2 0x00007fffe95ecd83 in cuEventDestroy_v2 () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.so.1
#3 0x00007fffb3535ec4 in ?? () from /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so.7
#4 0x00007fffb356e3b7 in ?? () from /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so.7

#7 0x00007fffb329587e in cudnnRNNForwardInference () from /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudnn.so.7
#8 0x00007fffd5a04f47 in at::native::_cudnn_rnn(at::Tensor const&, at::ArrayRefat::Tensor, long, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, at::Tensor const&, long, long, long, bool, double, bool, bool, at::ArrayRef, at::Tensor const&) ()
from /home/kimi/anaconda2/envs/py36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libATen.so

from /home/kimi/anaconda2/envs/py36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libATen.so
#10 0x00007fffe70636bb in torch::autograd::VariableType::_cudnn_rnn (this=, input=...,
weight=..., weight_stride0=, weight_buf=..., hx=..., cx=..., mode=2, hidden_size=1000,
num_layers=4, batch_first=false, dropout=, train=false, bidirectional=false,

When I training my model, after hundreds of batches, the segmentation fault always occurs. 

- PyTorch or Caffe2: Pytorch 
- OS: Ubuntu 16.04
- PyTorch version: 0.4.0a0+57ee202
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
- Python version: 3.6
- CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.1
